title-group.article-title: Retraction Note: Exploring the role of TESOL and digital technology in attitudinal change and sustainable learning for students of higher education

custom-meta.meta-value: © BioMed Central Ltd., part of Springer Nature 2025

body.p: The editor and the publisher have retracted this article. The article was submitted to be part of a guest-edited issue. An investigation by the publisher found a number of articles, including this one, with a number of concerns, including but not limited to compromised editorial handling and peer review process, inappropriate or irrelevant references or not being in scope of the journal or guest-edited issue. Based on the investigation’s findings the editor therefore no longer has confidence in the results and conclusions of this article.
Auithor Xin Wang has not explicitly stated whether they agree or disagree with the retraction. The other authors have not responded to correspondence regarding this retraction.

fn.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
